channel.title: Riots in UK
channel.description: Whats your opinion on this? I think its stupid.

item.title: Riots in UK
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:9, topic:409084”]nat good… It’s came to portsmouth, heres a picture of a building on fire down our seafront.

We have a football match aswell against barnet which doesn’t help at all.

EDIT: just seen this facebook group and lol’d
Smashing up your own city because you have the IQ of a ham sandwich]Smashing up your own city because you have the IQ of a ham sandwich[/quote]
Them ham sammichs are going to take over the world…

Don’t test them :o

This is just a excuse to fuck shit up.

Read full topic

Kill all these british fucks.
[/quote]
Just the chavvy cunts.

I wonder if pure2ownage is joining in…[/quote]
i guarantee he is.

OT: this really was an unnecessary act of violence but i do understand the anger that the people in the UK may feel, however that does not condone their actions.

item.title: Riots in UK
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:36, topic:409084”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=510368.msg3704996#msg3704996 date=1312973367]
All because some stupid kid fired at the cops and they retaliated.
[/quote]
Apparently he was shot for ‘no reason’ by the police, that I highly doubt![/quote]

ollie123:

Apparently Mark Duggan (the person that was killed by the Police, which started all of the violence) didn’t even fire at police in the first place. Still no excuse for the behaviour of the rioters.

Yea that’s been confirmed, he was being monitored by the police because they received reports that he possessed a firearm and was planning to use it, never was it actually used. They’ve done forensics and shit.

I’m not being affected by this (only the constant facebook reminders), living down in the best county (cornwall ofc), but it’s pathetic, chavvy cunts are just using it as an excuse to go around smashing and burning shit, just for the lulz.
Particularly gutted about the place that stored all the independant music label’s cds that got burnt down, few albums I was looking forward to have been delayed.

Read full topic

item.title: Riots in UK
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:33, topic:409084”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=510368.msg3704976#msg3704976 date=1312970690]
Seems like the riots are spreading closer to where I am, they better not fuck up anything.
[/quote]
Where you live bro?[/quote]

Around Norwich, saw about 7 Riot vans on my way there. Police everywhere too.

Read full topic

item.title: Riots in UK
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:30, topic:409084”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=510368.msg3704702#msg3704702 date=1312950559]

They’re all retarded… Just getting them self killed… If they don’t care about dying then they should just fight in the war with real men risking their life’s to save our countries.

You do realize that Riots do, even though they seem pointless, have points and reasons. People don’t just flash mob and attack buildings and people for no reasons.
[/quote]
People in the UK do.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Riots in UK
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:25, topic:409084”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=510368.msg3704650#msg3704650 date=1312948870]

greggs is the nicest place ever! They sell food like sandwiches, cakes, drinks and so on. Oh and pasties! (I think that’s how you spell it)

http://www.greggs.co.uk/

Ahh. So like a bakery somewhat? Just with sandwiches.
[/quote]

Yeah, greggs the bakery

Anyway, I’m gonna be deprived of correct food for weeks. All the major food selling points have had everything smashed up! I wish possessing a weapon was legal in this country, even if I had a wooden pole to defend myself I’d probably get in trouble.[/quote]
You could always fly to Canada, I’d bake something for you <3

Read full topic
